org.apache.flink.metrics.reporter

类 AbstractReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.metrics.reporter.AbstractReporter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CharacterFilter, MetricReporter
    直接已知子类:
    Slf4jReporter, StatsDReporter

    public abstract class AbstractReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricReporter, CharacterFilter
    Base interface for custom metric reporters.

      • notifyOfAddedMetric

        public void notifyOfAddedMetric(Metric metric,
                                java.lang.String metricName,
                                MetricGroup group)
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Called when a new Metric was added.
        指定者:
        notifyOfAddedMetric 在接口中 MetricReporter
        参数:
        metric - the metric that was added
        metricName - the name of the metric
        group - the group that contains the metric

      • notifyOfRemovedMetric

        public void notifyOfRemovedMetric(Metric metric,
                                  java.lang.String metricName,
                                  MetricGroup group)
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Called when a Metric was should be removed.
        指定者:
        notifyOfRemovedMetric 在接口中 MetricReporter
        参数:
        metric - the metric that should be removed
        metricName - the name of the metric
        group - the group that contains the metric
